summary: An ordinance authorizing the acquisition by purchase of Lots 9, 10, 11 and 12, Block 40, D. T. Denny's 3rd Addition to North Seattle in lieu of condemnation, for a civic center development under Ordinance 86033, and making an appropriation therefor from the Seattle Civic Center Development Bonds 1956 Fund.
committee: Finance and Parks and Public Grounds
